treatment-md.title: Teresirogas Quicke, Shaw, Achterberg, Bland, Butcher, Lyszkowski & Zhang, 2014, gen. nov.
treatment-md.article-title: A new Australian genus and five new species of Rogadinae (Hymenoptera: Braconidae), one reared as a gregarious endoparasitoid of an unidentified limacodid (Lepidoptera)
